def_cn: (表示身份不确定)无论是谁
def_en: You use whoever to refer to someone when their identity is not yet known.

def_cn: (指与人的身份无关)无论是谁
def_en: You use whoever to indicate that the actual identity of the person who does something will not affect a situation.

def_cn: (用在疑问句中代替who作为强调，通常表示惊讶)究竟是谁
def_en: You use whoever in questions as an emphatic way of saying 'who', usually when you are surprised about something.

def_cn: (表示不确定)或是别的什么人（或组织）
def_en: You say or whoever to refer vaguely to another person or organization, especially when you are not sure if you have mentioned the right person or organization.
